name: Sync Template (Lean) - Dynamic Slots with Overlay

nodes.name: Templated: Render Frame Preview
nodes.notes: Renders template with slot and overlay layers hidden to create frame preview (background only)

nodes.name: Templated: Render Overlay Preview
nodes.notes: Renders template with ONLY overlay layers visible (labels, arrows that appear ON TOP of photos)
